The Second Wave of Stories from Star Wars: The High Republic Is Here
10 Highlights and Reveals from the Star Wars: The High Republic Panel

    • High Republic Jedi Council Deep Dive, a Lesson on Wayseekers, and More!

      In this episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show Krystina updates the High Republic timeline with all the latest and greatest events, learns all about Wayseeker Jedi, and takes a deep dive into the Jedi Council during this new era. Plus, we catch up with Charles Soule, Cavan Scott, Justina Ireland, Claudia Gray, and Daniel José Older on the topics of characters to look out for, Yoda's baking recipes, and more.

    • New High Republic Comic Revealed, Lightsabers from the Prime of the Jedi, and More!

      In this installment of the Star Wars: The High Republic Show, we have the first details of a new High Republic comic from Marvel (along with more fun reveals)! Plus, Krystina goes inside the making of High Republic comics with Lucasfim's Rob Simpson, writer Cavan Scott, and artist Ario Anindito, we take a deep dive into lightsabers of the High Republic era, and more!

    • Ty Yorrick | Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic

      Ty Yorrick is an independent monster hunter of the High Republic era, using the skills she honed in her past to pave her way in the galaxy.

    • A Step Into the Dark, Art of The High Republic, and More!

      In this episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show Krystina updates us on all the latest and greatest from The High Republic, learns about how the art of this new era comes to life, and sits down with Claudia Gray, Daniel José Older, and Jennifer Heddle to talk all about Jedi Buckets of Blood and the creepy-crawly Drengir.

    • Ady Sun'Zee | Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic

      Ady Sun'Zee is a passionate Jedi Padawan, dedicated to uncovering secrets of the galaxy.

    • Leox Gyasi | Characters of Star Wars: the High Republic

      Leox Gyasi is the eccentric captain of the Vessel, content with going with the flow and traveling to whatever corner of the galaxy needs him.

    • Burryaga | Characters of Star Wars: the High Republic

      Burryaga Agaburry is a sensitive Jedi Padawan, determined to prove himself in an ever-intimidating galaxy.

    • Marchion Ro | Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic

      Marchion Ro is the mysterious Eye of the Nihil, providing the group of marauders with the right tools to stake their claim in the galaxy.

    • Sskeer | Characters of Star Wars: the High Republic

      Sskeer is a rigid Jedi Master of the High Republic era, unwilling to bend in the face of the galaxy's unknown dangers.

    • The Drengir | Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic

      The Drengir are monstrous mounds of greenry and vines, just waiting for people to fall into their traps.

    • Chancellor Lina Soh | Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic

      Lina Soh is the dutiful Chancellor of the Republic, ensuring peace and justice prosper in her galaxy.

    • Jedi Padawan Bell Zettifar | Characters of Star Wars: the High Republic

      Bell Zettifar is a studious Jedi Padawan of the High Republic era, hopeful to pass his Jedi trials and assist the galaxy as the Force guides him.

    • A Deep Dive Into Star Wars: The High Republic, Bringing A Younger Yoda to Life (in VR), and More!

      In the first episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show, Krystina brings you the latest and greatest news from The High Republic, finds out what it took to bring this new era into VR with ILMxLAB’s Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge, and sits down with Justina Ireland, Charles Soule, and Michael Siglain.

    • The Nihil | Characters of Star Wars the High Republic

      The Nihil are wicked marauders of the High Republic era, raiding planets on the fringes of the galaxy.

    • Avar Kriss | Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic

      Avar Kriss is a pragmatic Jedi Master of the High Republic era, eager to shine the light of the Jedi in the furthest corners of the galaxy.

    • Vernestra Rwoh | Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic

      Meet Vernestra Rwoh, the gifted young Jedi Knight from Star Wars: The High Republic.

    • Launch Trailer - Star Wars: The High Republic

      The adventure begins now...

    • Watch Now - Star Wars: The High Republic Launch Event

      Join host Kristin Baver, Lucasfilm's Michael Siglain, and authors Charles Soule, Justina Ireland, Cavan Scott, Claudia Gray, and Daniel José Older as they dive into the first stories of the new era of Star Wars storytelling, Star Wars: The High Republic.

    • Announce Trailer - Star Wars: The High Republic

      New stories will explore the Star Wars galaxy set 200 years before the events of The Phantom Menace.
